meanings.definition: A person who bids more than the value of something in an auction.
meanings.sent1: The overbidders at the auction drove the prices up.
meanings.sent2: The overbidders were determined to win the bidding war.
meanings.sent3: The overbidders accidentally bid too high on a rubber duck.
meanings.sent4: In the world of auctions, overbidders are like eager bees in a flower garden.
meanings.sent5: The overbidders stood out with their enthusiastic bidding.

meanings.definition: To bid more than the value of something in an auction.
meanings.sent1: She overbidders on the antique vase without realizing its true worth.
meanings.sent2: They always overbidders whenever they see something they really want.
meanings.sent3: He overbidders on a painting of a potato just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The excitement of the auction made her overbidders on every item.
meanings.sent5: The bidders tend to overbidders when the item is rare and valuable.
